title: League won't open, getting an "error"
body: Whenever my friend tries to run League this picture shows up. Help please {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
This is an issue with fullscreen mode that we're looking into. We've already deployed a small fix for this, but are still investigating into a permafix for everyone. Your friend should be able to bypass this for now by hitting **ALT+ENTER** in the loading screen, just be sure to tell them not to use Fullscreen mode until we get that fix out!

If you have any questions, let me know.
The thing is right when he starts league it crashes right away, it isn't an ingame issue.
Ah, I've never heard of this happening before getting in-game. Has your friend set their display settings in Windows to the recommended **1920x1080 @ 60Hz** configuration?
